In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

                                   In the present days Health plays a vital role in everyone life. Health consciousness has also been increasing among everyone. speaking about demand and supply in India. people demanding for more supple of good treatment for any disease. supply is less than that of demand in the present days.

                                     Everyone have to take preventive measures than that of cure. Government has to take effective measures to educate people. programs should be conducted and government has to organise programs in different villages in the way they  can understand it .In present days as education system has improved government can come up with posters and images that make people understand easily.

                                        Poor people should be provided with good medical facilities and they have to provide free medical camps in villages. people in those camps should be educated on the care taking of there health like wise they have to maintain cleanliness and they have to put there premises clean and tidy. These are few measures to be followed. There are villages where people mostly the women having major health problems and they are not out of the house even for educated fore such type of people they have to provide education by putting up campaigning. As studied before our population is half of female where it is declining in present, safty to women also should be taken care by the government.

                                          Government plays a vital role in our country any it can implement many changes with its safety measures. government being main body can bring up many improvement and implementations. The government have to to put up maximum efficiency in bring up the advance technics amongs people to give maximum returns to people. As india a developing country they have to take preventive measures rather than curing them. Government has to use sufficient fund for utilization of medical facilities and they have to utilize the resources to the maximum.

                                            Effective utilization of resources lead to effective treatment to the people and even can reduce ill health. High technology is also used in our country and everyone have to be benefited with those resources.
